What is the article about?
Jeremy Renner's recovery after a snowplow accident
Who is Jeremy Renner?
An actor, known for roles in Mayor of Kingstown and Marvel Studios' Avengers
What happened to Jeremy Renner on New Year's Day?
He was run over by a snowcat vehicle
Where did the accident take place?
Near Reno, Nevada
What is a snowcat?
A vehicle similar to a truck that runs on tracks instead of wheels
What injuries did Jeremy Renner sustain?
Blunt chest trauma and orthopedic injuries
When did Jeremy Renner undergo surgery?
Jan. 2
What show did Jeremy Renner watch with his family during recovery?
Episode 201 of Mayor of Kingstown
What platform is Mayor of Kingstown on?
Paramount+
How has Jeremy Renner updated fans on his recovery?
Through social media posts on Instagram and Twitter
